SEARCH
Module com.fugaku.platformer
Package com.fugaku.platformer.entities.tile

Class Platform

java.lang.Object
com.fugaku.platformer.entities.Entity
com.fugaku.platformer.entities.tile.Platform
public class Platform extends Entity
Represents a platform in the game that can be used by the player to jump on or walk across. The platform can have different textures, depending on its type.
Author:
Changyu Li

  • Constructor Details

    • Platform

      public Platform(int x, int y, int w, int h, int index)
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the platform's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the platform's position.
      w - The width of the platform.
      h - The height of the platform.
      index - The index used to retrieve the platform's texture from the AssetManager.
